title: S1 EP8: Rag & Bone's Senior Designer: Maureen Saturne
itunes:title: Rag & Bone's Senior Designer: Maureen Saturne
description: Maureen explains the role of a Technical Designer. She describes her role as the “engineer” to the designers; the importance of the Tech Pak and why ready-to-wear brands cannot compete with the fast fashion calendar.
content:encoded: Maureen explains the role of a Technical Designer. She describes her role as the “engineer” to the designers; the importance of the Tech Pak and why ready-to-wear brands cannot compete with the fast fashion calendar.
